desc: Zimbabwe, Kenya, South Africa, and other African nations are leading a record decline in U.S. tourism, marking a crucial shift in travel dynamics. Hereâ€™s everything you need to know.

title: Budget, FASTag rules, tobacco prices: Key things to watch out for on Feb 1
desc: Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman will present the Union Budget in Parliament on the first day of the month

title: Public debt breaches limit by Rs17tr
desc: Debt-to-GDP rises to 70.7% as FBR misses targets despite slowing refunds

title: 'Border 2' box office collection Day 9
desc: Sunny Deol's 'Border 2' has achieved remarkable box office success, crossing Rs 300 crore globally within 10 days of its release, despite facing competition from 'Mardaani 3'.

title: Columbia astronauts' chilling final moments after learning they were about to die
desc: Seven astronauts died when NASA's Space Shuttle Columbia broke apart during re-entry on 1 February 2003, with the crew unaware of the danger until their final moments

title: Molly Ringwald Says John Hughes Movies Shouldn't Be Remade
desc: Molly Ringwald doesn't think other directors should commit to remaking John Hughes movies like The Breakfast Club and Sixteen Candles.

title: Graft busters freeze RM1mil in accounts over e-waste probe, seizes RM170,000
desc: Graft busters have frozen two bank accounts worth an estimated RM1mil and seized about RM170,000 in cash following investigations into the management of electronic waste (e-waste).

title: Bangladesh end U19 World Cup campaign on winning note
desc: The Tigers scored a 74-run win over co-hosts Zimbabwe in Harare

title: A 'chia seed' trend on TikTok promotes a 'quick fix' to weight loss, but is it safe?
desc: The health benefits of chia seeds have been well publicised, but health and internet experts are urging people to not believe everything you see on social media.

title: Thousands converge at temples across Penang for Thaipusam
desc: GEORGE TOWN: Thousands of devotees are set to converge at temples across Penang for Thaipusam with a hive of rituals and gatherings already taking place since early hours of the morning.
